The Quranic researcher (P-93) Those who believed, did the righteous, set up prayer and pay zakat for them to their reward for their Lord, and there is no fear for them, nor they are grieving.A sentence that is subjected to the metaphor of the praise, and the interpretation of its counterparts is presented as close, and the intended is that the adjectives of the adversaries are the adjectives of the adjectives of the adjectives of the adjectives of the adjectives of the adversaries of the adjectives of the adjectives of the adjectives of the rituals of the rituals.The believers, and the appropriateness increases the appearance of his saying: “And they came to zakat.”
